content.rendered:
The Convergences World Forum will be held on September 8, 9 and 10 in Paris. Support Convergences’ goal towards a fair and sustainable world and help us promoting the World Forum. 

Download the network partner media pack

 

Why should you be a Convergences network partner?

By partnering with Convergences, you will support an event:

  • Offering a unique place to meet and think with actors from different sectors, within an overall perspective;
  • Placing the stakeholders’ initiatives in the heart of its program;
  • Highlighting various topics: international solidarity, environment, social and solidarity-based economy, social entrepreneurship, social business and microfinance.

As a network partner, you will take part in a large-scale collaboration project towards a fair and sustainable world.
We thank all the Convergences network partners naming them on our website and on the printed program handed out to the 5,000 visitors. Besides, through its website and newsletter, Convergences communicates on its partners’ activities to its extensive network.

Network partner media pack

The media pack includes all the contents related to the World Forum: e-mail template, newsletter content, tweets and banners.

Download the network partner media pack

The key periods until the Forum

Few key periods are defined below for the several months before the Forum.

Contacts :

Louise Pasin : + 33 (0)1 42 65 78 84

louise.pasin[@]www.convergences.org

Communication

jacques.de-laboulaye[@]www.convergences.org
